description: Mahagoda Vithanage Chandrarathne Dharmawardhana Vs. 1.	The Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption &  2.	Director General,  The Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption before Hon. Amal Ranaraja, J
parties: Mahagoda Vithanage Chandrarathne Dharmawardhana Vs. 1.	The Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption &  2.	Director General,  The Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption
keywords: Solicitation and gratification of sum of monies as an inducement to obtain a passenger transport permit from the National Transport Commission
legistation: Section 20(a) and section 20(b) of the Bribery Act No.11 of 1954 (as amended) -  Section 166 of the Code of Criminal Procedure Act No.15 of 1979 – Section 18 of the National Transport Commission Act No.37 of 1991 (as amended).
